comments.body:
Should'nt this also contains
```
if (gR == this) gR = nullptr;
```
?
Why is "TGX11::OpenDisplay" not called (and thus that code) in this use case while it is called in all other cases?

Hello Philippe,
this is to call R plots, not ROOT plots.
The system is producing
`
[[xcb] Unknown sequence number while processing reply
[xcb] Most likely this is a multi-threaded client and XInitThreads has not been called
[xcb] Aborting, sorry about that.
root.exe: ../../src/xcb_io.c:641: _XReply: Assertion `!xcb_xlib_threads_sequence_lost' failed.]
`
If you are calling R plots after call ROOT plots there is no problems, 
but If you are calling R plots without call any ROOT plot this is required.
